casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derrick D. BOGER 158P06-16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Derrick D. Boger, for Boger, Derrick D. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of October 2017 by Defendant for Civil Complaint in Tort Action:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
